tactics.name: Target Age-Specific Keywords
tactics.description: Prioritize keywords with age ranges to narrow audience and improve conversion rates.
steps: Use Publisher Rocket to filter keywords by age demographics
Focus on keywords with green/yellow color indicators
Combine main keyword with secondary related terms for SEO
caveats: Avoid overly broad keywords with high competition
source_quotes: 'riddles for kids ages 12 to 14' is a better target than generic riddles'

heuristics.name: color_code_priority
heuristics.condition: If keyword shows green color code, prioritize for publishing

heuristics.name: Color-Coded Keyword Selection
heuristics.condition: If keyword has green/yellow color coding, prioritize for SEO
source_quotes: 'don't worry about raw numbers, go off the color'
